Class StartSolrMojo

    ArtifactResolverConfiguration, SolrVersionConfiguration, BootstrapConfiguration, JettyConfiguration, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RunSolrMojo

    @Mojo(name="start")
public class StartSolrMojo
extends AbstractSolrMojo
    Start a new Apache Solr instance and executes while Maven is running.
